sServerTab0: General Operations:
- This server is a friendly PVE with ONE PvP zone (NWAF Airfield)
- We are a friendly community here, if other players need a helping hand please try.
- Please do not wait for people to enter the PvP zone then kill on sight. Give them a standing chance!
- No base raiding. No stealing of loot unless in the Pvp zone
- Abusive/Toxic players will not be tolerated, contact an admin for assistance.
- Loot cycling is NOT allowed.
- Global chat should be English only. No spamming allowed in any channel.
- Claim missions in global chat with mission name and location, when you are within 200m of start.
- Once mission is complete please put on in game chat cleared {mission}
- Find us on Discord using the link in bottom right corner.
- Most importantly, have fun and meet new people.
Base Building rules:
- The maximum size of your base must be 3x3x2.
- Don't hoard items in your base.
- 5 storage items (cabinets,safes,lockers ect.) OR  2 tents.
- Clans may have up 8 storage items per base.
- No hoarding of vehicles, a maximum of 2 vehicles per PLAYER/BASE.
- Please resepct the storage rules as it really helps with server performance
- No building within 100m of the following:
Police Stations, Hospitals, Churches,
Fire Stations, or Supermarkets.
- You must not build your base less than 1KM from military base's & any trader around the map.
- You must not build your base less than 500m from any military checkpoint
-  If you're using base building plus then you cannot have a cabin. Cabin and vanilla fencing is fine.
- For any questions regarding base building or location, please consult an admin.
- If using barbed wire on base please ensure it's only the top half of the wall.
- Base locations must be posted on the discord channel- Base Locations
sServerTab1: Toggle Earplugs - N -/= to adjust volume
Use a wrench to unflip a vehicle.
Trader locations are marked on map.
ATM machines located near traders, all players start with 50,000 rubles
Join Discord with the link on bottom right to see chat, server updates, killfeeds and other news.
Use Discord to submit bug reports, make suggestions and ask for admin assistance.
Some vehicles not available on traders can be purchased with admin assistance. Chat us up on Discord.
Have fun, enjoy & Welcome to the Logic family!
sServerTab2: Splint (Rag or bandage or duct tape + 1x Stick)
Torch (Rag or bandage or animal lard + stick)
Improvised fishing rod (1x Long Wooden Stick + Rope or Improvised Rope)
Fireplace (Rag or bandage or note or book or Oak bark or Birch bark 1x Stick)
